name: DLATS
description:
So, I have seen a random video with this game and want to realize it as a videogame.

RULES
The game continues until one of the players scores 3 points.

DEFENCE-SIDE.
You need to choose the side that you will be looking at, by using the arrows. If your opponent pointed a side which you were looking at, he will receive a point.

ATTACK-SIDE.
You need to choose the side that you will be pointing at, by using the arrows. If your opponent looks a side which you were pointed at, you will receive a point.

WHAT IS LUCKLEVEL?
Lucklevel affects only on attack-side for your enemies, they will look to another side with more chances.
